creator: albert@geokhi.ru
text:
When Skype (popular webtelephone software) is used - the port 80 by default is 
occupied and Apache Service Installation is blocked.
Resolution: set off the Skype or block this port for the Skype.

Thanks for your report, but since you have not identified a bug in the Apache
HTTP Server, I will close it.
creator: slive@apache.org
